title: Full-Stack Engineer | Mathematician
summary: Software Engineer with experience developing internal tools and automating workflows using Python. Using my strong foundation in mathematical engineering to translate complex problems into effective software solutions. Currently enhancing Full-Stack development skills with a focus on React and TypeScript. Seeking opportunities to keep learning and apply my analytical thinking.

activities: Create and maintain Python tools to automate daily tasks. Make the workflows more efficient, reducing human and manual errors.
Write scripts to connect to different animation platforms ensuring a smoother pipeline.
Design and implement internal interfaces using PySide/Qt.
Work with teams from different areas and translate their needs into functional tools.
Create scripts to analyze large datasets to get statistical models and results for clients.
Apply my mathematical background to turn the needs of the clients into clear tasks.
Working in Agile and Scrum environments.
Take part in research projects. Learn to work independently.
Gained the ability to work on complex and abstract problems, to find logical solutions.

education.title: Master of Science in  Mathematical Engineering

skills.skills: Python, JavaScript (ES6+), SQL, React, HTML5, SCSS, JSON, Next.js (Learning), TypeScript (Learning)
Analytical Problem-Solving, Effective Remote Collaboration, Business-Oriented Mindset, Attention to Detail and Rigor, Debugging experience

projects: Personal project: Full-stack Book Club App with FastAPI (Python) and React (GitHub book-club-hub)

certifications.title: Complete Web Design: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue, React, Git
